item.lanterns.broadsides-lantern.name: Lanterne de bordée
item.lanterns.broadsides-lantern.lantern: Drop a bomb from above that explodes after {{bombTime}} second.  Deals {{damage}} damage and can interrupt Behemoths.
item.lanterns.drasks-eye.name: Oeil de Drask
item.lanterns.drasks-eye.lantern_ability: Fires a lightning bolt in a direction that deals {{shockDamage}} Shock damage multiple times as it passes through enemies.
item.lanterns.embermanes-rapture.name: Embuscade de l'Embermane
item.lanterns.embermanes-rapture.lantern: Create a fire ball in front of you that explodes after {{fireBallTime}} seconds, dealing {{blazeDamage}} Blaze damage to all nearby enemies.
item.lanterns.koshais-bloom.name: Floraison du Koshai
item.lanterns.koshais-bloom.lantern_abil: Dash in a direction, deal {{terraDamage}} Terra damage to nearby enemies upon arrival, and gain {{percentLifesteal}}% lifesteal for {{lifestealTime}} seconds.
item.lanterns.pangars-shine.name: Éclat de Pangar
item.lanterns.pangars-shine.lantern_abil: Create a frost pillar in front of you that deals {{frostDamage}} Frost damage to nearby enemies over {{damageTime}} seconds.
item.lanterns.recruits-lantern.name: Lanterne de recrue
item.lanterns.recruits-lantern.lantern_a: Grants a {{shield}} hit point shield that lasts {{shieldTime}} seconds.
item.lanterns.shrikes-zeal.name: Fougue du Shrike
item.lanterns.shrikes-zeal.lantern_abili: Creates an aura that grants nearby Slayers {{percentIncreasedMovementAndAttackSpeed}}% increased move speed and attack speed for {{attackSpeedTime}} seconds.
item.lanterns.skarns-defiance.name: Défiance du Skarn
item.lanterns.skarns-defiance.lantern_ab: Surrounds the slayer in swirling stone that deals {{terraDamage}} Terra damage to nearby enemies for {{damageTime}} seconds. Also generates {{shield}} hit point shields per second that expire after {{shieldTime}} seconds. (Max {{maxShield}} shields)
item.perks.acidic.name: Acide
item.perks.acidic.description: Augmente les dégâts mutilants au détriment des dégâts aux membres.
Convertit {{percentPartToWoundDamage}}% des dégâts aux membres en dégâts mutilants
item.perks.adrenaline.name: Adrénaline
item.perks.adrenaline.description: Augmente les dégâts infligés en fonction de l'endurance dépensée.
item.perks.adrenaline.effects.1.descript: Donne +{{percentDamage}}% de dégâts par tranche de {{missingStamina}} endurance manquante.
item.perks.adrenaline.effects.6.descript: Donne +{{percentDamage}}% de dégâts par tranche de {{missingStamina}} endurance manquante.
item.perks.aegis.name: Égide
item.perks.aegis.description: Augmente la quantité de boucliers reçus. À haut niveau, après avoir gagné 1 000 boucliers, ignorez le prochain coup reçu dans les 15 prochaines secondes.
item.perks.aegis.effects.1.description.0: Augmente tous les boucliers reçus de {{percentShields}}%
item.perks.aegis.effects.4.description.1: Après avoir gagné {{shieldGained}} boucliers de n'importe quelle source, ignorez le prochain coup reçu dans les {{ignoreTime}} prochaines secondes.
item.perks.aetherborne.name: Jouvence aethérée
item.perks.aetherborne.description: Augmente les avantages liés à l'utilisation des puits d'aether.
item.perks.aetherborne.effects.1.descrip: À l'utilisation d'un puits d'aether, donne +{{ventAdditionalHeal}} de soin et offre {{percentVentReduction}}% de chance de ne pas consommer de charge du puits
item.perks.aetherborne.effects.4.descrip: Passez en ruée aethérée lorsque vous utilisez un courant d'aether.
item.perks.aetherhunter.name: Chasse-aether
item.perks.aetherhunter.description: Augmente les dégâts contre les Behemoths chargés d'aether.
item.perks.aetherhunter.effects.1.descri: +{{percentDamageVsAether}}% de dégâts contre les Behemoths chargés en aether
item.perks.aetheric-attunement.name: Harmonisation aethérée
item.perks.aetheric-attunement.descripti: Accélère le rechargement de la capacité de votre lanterne.
item.perks.aetheric-attunement.effects.1: Accélère le rechargement des capacités de votre lanterne de {{percentLanternRecharge}}%
item.perks.aetheric-evasion.name: Esquive aethérée
item.perks.aetheric-evasion.description: Réduit le temps de recharge des capacités de votre lanterne en cas d'esquive des attaques des Behemoths.
item.perks.aetheric-evasion.effects.1.de: Lorsque vous esquivez une attaque, réduisez le temps de recharge de votre capacité de lanterne de {{percentLanternCooldown}}%.
item.perks.agility.name: Agilité
item.perks.agility.description: Réduit le coût en endurance des esquives.
item.perks.assassins-frenzy.name: Frénésie d'assassin

item.perks.assassins-frenzy.effects.1.de: Chaque fois que vous brisez ou aidez à briser une partie de Behemoth, gagnez +{{percentAttackSpeed}}% de vitesse d'attaque pendant {{attackSpeedTime}} secondes.
item.perks.assassins-vigour.name: Vigueur d'assassin
item.perks.assassins-vigour.description: Régénère de la vie après avoir brisé une partie d'un Behemoth.
item.perks.assassins-vigour.effects.1.de: Après avoir brisé une partie d'un Behemoth, vous vous soignez de {{partBreakHeal}}
item.perks.barbed.name: Barbelé
item.perks.barbed.description: Ajoute une quantité fixe de dégâts mutilants à chaque coup.
Après avoir esquivé une attaque, votre prochaine attaque dans les 5 secondes inflige +{{woundDamageNextAttack}} points de dégâts mutilants
item.perks.berserker.name: Berserker
item.perks.berserker.description: Réduit la santé maximale. Infliger des dégâts augmente les dégâts infligées pendant une courte période.
item.perks.berserker.effects.1.descripti: Après avoir infligé des dégâts, gagnez {{percentDamage}}% de dégâts pendant {{damageTime}} secondes. S'empile jusqu'à {{damageStacks}} fois.

item.perks.bladestorm.description: Ajoute une quantité fixe de dégâts aux membres à chaque coup.
item.perks.bladestorm.effects.4.descript: Après avoir esquivé une attaque, votre prochaine attaque dans les {{nextAttackTime}} secondes inflige +{{partDamageNextAttack}} points de dégâts aux membres
item.perks.bloodless.name: Coagulation
item.perks.bloodless.description: Protège contre les statuts « Blessé » et « Hémorragie ».
item.perks.bloodless.effects.1.descripti: Réduit la durée de l'effet de statut « Blessé » de {{percentWoundedReduction}}%
item.perks.bloodless.effects.3.descripti: Immunité à l'effet de statut « Blessé »
item.perks.bloodless.effects.4.descripti: Réduit l'effet du statut « Hémorragie » de {{percentCripplingWoundedReduction}}%
item.perks.bloodless.effects.6.descripti: Immunité à l'effet de statut « Hémorragie »
item.perks.cascade.name: Cascade

item.perks.cascade.effects.4.description: À l'utilisation maintenue de la lanterne, générez de manière aléatoire {{boostQuantity}} des boosts suivants: guérison, endurance, puissance.
item.perks.cascade.effects.5.description: Boost de soin confère également des boucliers (max {{maxShield}}).
item.perks.cascade.effects.6.description: Durée du boost de puissance accrue.

item.perks.insulated.effects.4.descripti: Réduit le recule et les dégâts reçus en frappant les boucliers électriques
item.perks.insulated.effects.5.descripti: Réduit le recule et les dégâts reçus en frappant les boucliers électriques

item.perks.medic.description: Améliore votre capacité à réanimer vos alliés.
item.perks.medic.effects.1.description.0: Lorsque vous réanimez un allié, ce dernier récupère {{percentAllyHeal}}% de vie en plus
item.perks.medic.effects.4.description.1: Augmente la vitesse de réanimation de {{reviveSpeed}}%
item.perks.medic.effects.6.description.2: Après avoir relevé un allié, gagnez un bouclier de santé de {{healthShield}} points pendant {{shieldTime}} secondes

item.perks.merciless.name: Impitoyable

item.perks.merciless.effects.4.descripti: Augmente la durée pendant laquelle une partie reste blessée de {{percentWoundDuration}}%.

item.perks.molten.effects.3.description: lnfliger des dégâts génère deux cœurs fondus avec un temps de recharge de {{moltenCooldown}} secondes, accordant une immunité au feu et augmentant la vitesse d‘attaque et de déplacement.
item.perks.molten.effects.5.description: lnfliger des dégâts génère trois cœurs fondus avec un temps de recharge de {{moltenCooldown}} secondes, accordant une immunité au feu et augmentant la vitesse d‘attaque et de déplacement.

item.perks.nine-lives.effects.4.descript: Au lieu d'être mis à terre, vous restez debout et récupérez {{knockedOutHeal}}points de vie. {{healCooldown}} minutes de rechargement
item.perks.nine-lives.effects.6.descript: Au lieu d'être mis à terre, vous restez debout et récupérez {{knockedOutHeal}} points de vie. +{{percentAttackSpeed}}% de vitesse de mouvement et d'attaque pendant {{empoweredTime}} secondes. {{healCooldown}} minutes de rechargement
item.perks.omnisurge.name: Omniflux
item.perks.omnisurge.description: Réduit le rechargement de votre compétence d'Omnicellule. Aux rangs supérieurs, activer votre compétence d'omnicellule réduit le temps de rechargement de votre compétence de lanterne.
item.perks.omnisurge.effects.1.descripti: Réduit le rechargement de votre compétence d'Omnicellule de {{omnicellCooldownReduction}}%.
item.perks.omnisurge.effects.4.descripti: Réduit le rechargement de votre compétence de lanterne de {{lanternCooldownReduction}}%.

item.perks.overpower.effects.1.descripti: +{{percentDamageVsStaggered}}% de dégâts contre les Behemoths étourdis

item.perks.parasitic.effects.1.descripti: When you take damage, {{percentDelayedDamage}}% of it is delayed and instead dealt  over {{delayedDamageTime}} seconds. While you take delayed damage, gain {{percentLifesteal}}%  lifesteal. Does not apply to damage under {{minimumAppliedHealth}}% of your max HP.

item.perks.pulse.effects.1.description.0: Every {{hits}}th hit with your weapon is a critical hit.

item.perks.ragehunter.name: Chasse-rage
item.perks.ragehunter.description: Augmente les dégâts contre les Behemoths enragés.

item.perks.relentless.effects.4.descript: Increases the effects of your aether rush by +{{percentAetherRushEffect}}%
item.perks.savagery.name: Sauvagerie
item.perks.savagery.description: Augmente les dégâts contre les membres mutilés.

item.perks.sharpened.effects.4.descripti: Après avoir esquivé une attaque, votre prochaine attaque dans les {{nextAttackTime}} secondes inflige +{{percentPartDamageNextAttack}}% aux dégâts aux membres
item.perks.shellshock-resist.name: Résilience

item.perks.shellshock-resist.effects.6.d: Immune to shellshocked explosion damage and status effect

item.perks.sprinter.effects.6.descriptio: +{{percentMoveSpeed}}% movement speed and {{percentSprintCost}} reduced sprint cost

item.perks.tenacious.description: Gagnez des dégâts bonus en fonction de vos PV.
item.perks.tenacious.effects.1.descripti: Pour chaque {{health}} PV actuels, gagnez {{percentDamage}}% de dégâts bonus.
item.perks.tough.name: Robustesse

item.perks.vampiric.effects.1.descriptio: After a Behemoth is wounded, heal for {{woundedHeal}}
item.perks.warmth.name: Chauffe

item.weapons.the-twin-suns.description: Lance des magnétobombes explosives qui s'accrochent à la cible et détonnent à la commande. Comme le dit l'ancien proverbe ostien, « Quand les Soleils jumeaux se lèvent, votre journée est déjà finie. »
item.weapons.the-twin-suns.unique_effect: While Empowered, gain +{{criticalGain}}% critical strike chance instead of bonus damage.
Load {{magBombs}} Mag Bombs into your magazine. They attach to enemies and are detonated on Reload. The first Mag Bomb attached to each Behemoth part deals +{{damage}} damage.

Dash in a direction, becoming invulnerable for the duration. After dodging through an attack, fire {{miniShots}} mini-shots that always crit. While in Mag Bomb mode, fires {{magBombs}} Mag Bombs instead.
After a critical strike, reduce the cooldown of Mag Bomb mode by {{cooldownReduceTime}} seconds.

item.weapons.call-of-the-firebird.name: L'appel de l'oiseau de feu
item.weapons.call-of-the-firebird.descri: Une hache forgée a partir des trophées de Phaelanx.
item.weapons.call-of-the-firebird.unique:
Attack a Behemoth part to lock onto it and load a homing missile. Missile deals {{damageMissile}} damage and increases the
damage of every other missile in the volley by {{damageMissileVolley}}. Deal damage to load up to a maximum of {{maxMissiles}} additional missiles.
Dodging fires all loaded missiles on the locked-on part. {{cooldown}} second cooldown.

item.parts.aetherstrikers.mods.cyclonic-: Tempest Form duration increased by {{timeIncreased}} seconds. When Tempest Form has less than {{timeLess}} seconds remaining, deal +{{damage}}% damage.
item.parts.aetherstrikers.mods.echo-brac: Critical strikes increase the damage dealt by Karma Breaker's damage over time by {{damage}}% until the debuff ends or is refreshed.
item.parts.aetherstrikers.mods.inertial-: Surge deals +{{damage}}% damage. After surging, gain +{{speed}}% movespeed for {{speedTime}} seconds. Stacks up to {{speedStack}} times.
item.parts.aetherstrikers.specials.adama: Unleash energy in a focused blast, dealing {{damageBlast}} damage to the first enemy hit. Deals up to +{{damage}}% damage when Tempest Form and Karma Breaker's effects are active.
item.parts.aetherstrikers.specials.titan: Unleash energy forward in a pressure wave, dealing {{damageWave}} damage to the closest target and {{damageNearbyTarget}} damage to nearby target. Deals up to +{{damage}}% damage when Tempest Form and Karma Breaker's effects are active.
item.parts.axe.mods.furious-axecore.name: Cœur de hache furieux
item.parts.axe.mods.furious-axecore.part: Perfectly charged attacks grants +{{meter}} meter on hit, but no longer grant resolve.
item.parts.axe.mods.lightweight-haft.par: Les déplacements tout en chargeant des frappes horizontales sont maintenant accélérés au lieu d'être ralentis et ne coutent plus d'Endurance.
item.parts.axe.mods.overcharged-cylinder: Determination can now stack up to {{times}} times.
item.parts.axe.mods.railsplitters-cantee: Tonics consumed while your axe is thrown have +{{effect}}% effectiveness.
item.parts.axe.mods.volatile-axecore.par: Les attaques chargées infligent des dégâts de zone aux ennemis proches pour chaque niveau de charge.
item.parts.axe.specials.flight-of-ruin.p: Lancez la hache, infligeant en continu 60 de dégâts et gagnez 2 points de jauge par coup. Réactivez pour la rappeler et effectuer une attaque puissante qui inflige jusqu'à 500 de dégâts (augmentés par la détermination) et gagnant 15 points de jauge.
item.parts.axe.specials.grim-onslaught.p: Lancez la hache vers l'avant, infligeant jusqu'à 800 de dégâts (augmenté par la détermination) aux ennemis sur son passage et gagnant 15 points de jauge en touchant un Behemoth. Rattrapez la hache pour gagnez 30 points de jauge.
item.parts.axe.specials.relentless-onsla: Hurl the axe forward, damaging enemies in its path. Catch the axe to throw it again up to {{axeThrow}} more times in the next {{axeThrowTime}} seconds, dealing {{axeDamage1}}/{{axeDamage2}}/{{axeDamage3}} damage (further increased by determination). Does not build meter.
item.parts.chainblades.mods.demolition-b: Deal +{{damage}}% damage to minions, fauna and objects created by Behemoths. On killing a minion, fauna, or object, gain {{momentum}} momentum.
item.parts.chainblades.mods.hurricane-bl: L'utilisation de Vrille-lame octroie une accumulation de bonus de dégâts par coup, qui s'appliquent lors d'autres attaques.
item.parts.chainblades.mods.lightweight-: Increase the length of your chains by +{{lengthBonus}}%. Your Chain Pull deals +{{damage}}% damage and generates an additional {{meter}} meter.
item.parts.chainblades.mods.momentum-bla: After using a special, your next special use within {{time}} seconds is free.
item.parts.chainblades.mods.serrated-bla: Bladed attacks have a chance to cause your next {{attacks}} lacerating attacks to deal +{{damage}}% wound damage.
item.parts.chainblades.specials.cruel-ri: Teleport forward with invulnerability and strike the nearest Behemoth part, dealing {{damage}} damage and applying a mark that deals {{damageMark}} damage per second for {{damageMarkTime}} seconds. When a mark expires, it deals {{damageMarkExpires}} damage for each other mark active at the time. Mark duration increased to {{timeMarkIncreased}} seconds if an attack is avoided during the teleport.
item.parts.chainblades.specials.insatiab: Push off a nearby target with invulnerability, then use primary or secondary attacks to perform a followup. Primary: A dash attack to the target that consumes {{momentum}} momentum. Secondary: A spinning slam that consumes all momentum to heal you and create a {{heal}} healing orb for each momentum consumed. Targets at or healed to full health gain {{damage}}% damage for {{damageTime}} seconds, stacking up to {{damageStack}} times. (Consume {{momentumIfNoFollow}} momentum if no follow up is performed.)
item.parts.chainblades.specials.reapers-: Push off a nearby target with invulnerability, then use primary or secondary attacks to perform a follow up. Primary: A dash attack to the target that consumes {{momentum}} momentum. Secondary: A spinning slam that consumes all momentum and deals greatly increased damage per momentum consumed. (Consume {{momentumIfNoFollow}} momentum if no follow up is performed)
item.parts.hammer.mods.antique-clip.name: Chargeur antique
item.parts.hammer.mods.antique-clip.part: Ammo decreased to {{ammoDecrease}}, but bonus from aethercharged ammo is increased by {{percentDamage}}%.
item.parts.hammer.mods.impulse-crown.par: Aerial Strike grants increased damage dealt for {{damageTime}} seconds. Bonus is doubled if a Behemoth's head is struck.
item.parts.hammer.mods.turbine-trigger.p: Priming attacks increases attack speed by {{percentAttackSpeed}}% until the combo ends. Stacks.
item.parts.hammer.mods.weighted-crown.pa: Les dégâts d'étourdissement ne sont plus réduits de moitié quand vous attaquez les jambes des Behemoths
item.parts.hammer.specials.concussive-sa: Maintenez pour charger des munitions dans le marteau. Libérez pour déclencher une explosion qui inflige jusqu'à 260 de dégâts en fonction des munitions chargées et peut interrompre les Behemoths. La portée augmente avec des munitions chargées.
item.parts.hammer.specials.ironheart-lan: Hold to load ammo into the hammer. Release to create an aether vent that buffs players who step over it, granting them +{{percentDamageReduction}}% damage reduction and up to {{healing}} healing over {{healingTime}} seconds when aethercharged.
item.parts.hammer.specials.mighty-landbr: Maintenez pour charger des munitions dans le marteau. Libérez pour créer un vent d'aether qui booste les joueurs qui passent dessus, leur accordant jusqu'à +35% de dégâts en fonction de la qualité des munitions
item.parts.repeater.chambers.full-bore-c: Tire un carreau perforant en ligne, infligeant des dégâts décroissants avec la distance.
Aethérochargé : Inflige beaucoup plus de dégâts et repousse le Slayer en arrière.
item.parts.repeater.chambers.marksman-ch: Fires a shot in a line, dealing {{damage}} damage to the first Behemoth hit. If a part is struck, that part takes {{percentDamage}}% more damage from Shots for {{damageTime}} seconds.
Empowered: Damage bonus increased to {{empoweredPercentDamage}}%, and {{empoweredPercentAllyDamage}}% to all allies.
item.parts.repeater.chambers.salvo-chamb: Fires an explosive missile in a line, dealing {{damage}} damage in an area upon impact.
Empowered: Fires {{missiles}} missiles in a spread.
Launches a collectible buff a short distance, granting {{percentAttackSpeed}}% increased attack speed for {{attackSpeedTime}} seconds when collected.
Aethérochargé: Donne le même bonus à tous les Slayers.
item.parts.repeater.grips.saboteurs-grip: Launches an explosive mine that deals {{damage}} damage. Mine charges after a short period, increasing damage to {{increasedDamage}}.
Empowered: Deals {{empoweredDamage}} damage when charged and can interrupt Behemoths.
item.parts.repeater.mods.capacitive-maga: Using an ability returns {{ammo}} standard ammo to the magazine.
item.parts.repeater.mods.demolition-sigh: While empowered, deal +{{percentObjectDamage}}% damage to objects created by Behemoths.
item.parts.repeater.mods.extraction-cata: Reduce both ability cooldowns by {{cooldownReduction}} seconds when dodging through Behemoth attacks.
item.parts.repeater.mods.lightweight-fra: Gain {{percentMovespeed}}% increased movespeed when at {{currentAmmo}} or less ammo.
Grants {{percentCritChance}}% critical strike chance for each round missing from the magazine.
item.parts.repeater.mods.precision-sight: Deal {{damage}} increased damage when attacking the same part multiple times. Stacks up to {{stacks}} times.
item.parts.repeater.mods.tacticians-maga: Empowered Reloading at exactly {{currentAmmo}} ammo decreases the cooldown of both abilities by {{cooldownReduction}} seconds.
item.parts.sword.mods.charged-swordfocus: Instead of dealing damage over time, Resounding Echo deals damage once after it expires and deals +{{percentDamage}}% total damage.
After using any Valour combo, your next Valour combo within {{damageTime}} seconds deals +{{percentDamage}}% damage.
item.parts.sword.mods.keen-edge.name: Fil du rasoir
item.parts.sword.mods.keen-edge.part_eff: After dealing damage with the Bladesurge projectile, increase your movement speed by {{percentMovespeed}}% for {{movespeedTime}} seconds. Additionally, after the Bladesurge projectile travels a short distance, the damage is increased by {{percentDamage}}%.
Each Valour gained or spent restores {{health}} health
item.parts.sword.mods.recursive-hilt.par: Dealing damage with Bladerush restores {{stamina}} stamina and generates {{valour}} Valour over {{valourTime}} seconds. Does not stack.
item.parts.sword.specials.ardent-cyclone: Activate at full meter to spin, dealing {{damage}} damage constantly to nearby enemies. Grants {{valour}} Valour every {{valourTime}} seconds. Reactivate to slash in a direction, dealing {{reactivateDamage}} + ({{hitBonusDamage}} x number of spin hits) to the first enemy hit.
item.parts.sword.specials.avenging-overd: Activate at full meter to enter Overdrive, gaining +{{percentAttackSpeed}}% attacks speed and causing attacks to deal +{{aoeDamageMin}}-{{aoeDamageMax}} aoe damage. Reactivate to parry and riposte a Behemoth attack, dealing {{damage}} damage and granting {{valour}} Valour when successful ({{valourCooldown}} second cooldown)
item.parts.sword.specials.valiant-overdr: Activate at full meter to enter Overdrive, gaining +{{percentAttackSpeed}}% attack speed and causing attacks to deal +{{aoeDamageMin}}-{{aoeDamageMax}} aoe damage. Grants {{valour}} Valour immediately and then {{valourRegen}} Valour every {{valourTime}} seconds. Reactivate to dash in a direction (Costs {{valourCost}} Valour).
item.parts.warpike.mods.balanced-spearhe: Augmente les dégâts infligés de {{damageIncreasePierceAndHarvest}}% chaque fois que des attaques perçantes et absorbantes sont alternées. Aprés la cinquième attaque alternée, les dégats infligés augmentent de {{damageIncreaseAfterFifthAttack}}% pendant {{duration}} secondes. Réinitialisé à la fin du combo.
item.parts.warpike.mods.barbed-spearhead: After a dodge piercing attack, gain +{{percentWoundDamage}}% wound damage for {{woundDamageTime}} seconds.
item.parts.warpike.mods.executioners-spe: Each time you wound or assist wounding a Behemoth, gain {{percentDamage}}% damage for {{damageTime}} seconds. Stacks up to {{stacks}}.
item.parts.warpike.mods.lightweight-shaf: L'attaque de charge à la lance ne coûte plus d'Endurance et est toujours critique.
item.parts.warpike.mods.munitions-amplif: Stored ammo quality increases slowly over time, up to max. Stored ammo quality is also increased by an additional {{ammoQuality}}%.
item.parts.warpike.specials.concussive-p: Press to convert meter into ammo. Hold to spend ammo to fire a missile that deals up to {{damage}} damage based on ammo quality and can interrupt Behemoths.
item.parts.warpike.specials.reckless-lea: Press to convert meter into ammo. Hold to spend ammo and perform a flying lunge attack that deals up to {{damage}} damage based on distance and ammo quality.
item.parts.warpike.specials.savage-wells: Press to convert meter into ammo. Hold to spend ammo to create an aura that buffs nearby allies with up to +{{percentCritChance}}% critical strike chance based on ammo quality for {{critChanceTime}} seconds.
item.omnicells.artificer.name: Artificier
item.omnicells.artificer.active: Command: Your drone acts based on the target.{{NL}} 1. Slayer: Remove negative status effects and grant Artificer Aura for {{statusRemovalTime}}s.{{NL}} 2. Ground: Create a wall that blocks hostile projectiles and grants Artificer Aura to nearby Slayers for {{wallTime}}s.{{NL}} 3. Behemoth: Make a part to take +{{percentDamage}}% damage for {{damageTime}}s.{{NL}} 4. Downed Slayer: Revive and grant Artificer Aura for {{reviveAuraTime}}s (once every {{reviveCooldown}}s).{{NL}} Artificer Aura: Restore {{auraHeal}} health/second. At full health, grants {{auraShield}} Shields/second that last for {{shieldTime}}s (maximum {{maxShields}} Shields){{NL}} Cooldown: {{cooldown}}s
item.omnicells.artificer.passive: Amount of healing and shielding granted per second is increased by {{healingAndShielding}} for every {{currentHealth}} current health when activated.
item.omnicells.bastion.name: Bastion
item.omnicells.bastion.active: Leap forward and slam the ground consuming all shields in a blast of energy that deals damage to nearby targets equal to {{percentShieldDamage}}% the amount of shields consumed. {{damageCooldown}} second cooldown.
item.omnicells.bastion.passive: Increase all shields received by {{percentShieldIncrease}}%. Dealing damage has a chance to grant a stacking, refreshing {{shield}} health shield that lasts for {{shieldTime}} seconds (max {{maxShields}} shields).
item.omnicells.discipline.name: Discipline
item.omnicells.discipline.active: Perform a quick parrying punch that deals {{blazeDamage}} blaze damage. Parrying an attack does +{{percentParryDamage}}% damage and grants a stack of Flaming Fist,  giving +{{percentCritDamage}}% critical strike damage. This can stack {{stacks}} times.  {{cooldown}} second cooldown.
item.omnicells.discipline.passive: Critical strike chance and damage increased by {{percentCritChanceAndCritDamage}}%. Healing is reduced by {{percentHealingReduction}}%. Reaching max stacks of Flaming Fist makes you Disciplined, increasing your critical strike chance by {{percentCritChance}}% for {{critChanceTime}} seconds  but increased damage received by {{percentDamageReceived}}%. When Disciplined ends, stacks are cleared.
item.omnicells.iceborne.name: Sang froid
item.omnicells.iceborne.active: Throw an ice lance that does {{frostDamage}} frost damage, double damage if thrown at full health. Also prevents you from being staggered and grants +{{percentLifesteal}}% lifesteal  for {{lifestealTime}} seconds. {{cooldown}} second cooldown.
item.omnicells.iceborne.passive: Increase max health by {{maxHealth}}. Gain {{percentLifesteal}}% lifesteal and {{percentDamageReduction}}% reduced damage, then again for every {{missingHealth}} missing health. Taking damage reduces cooldown of the Active Ability by {{cooldownReduction}} seconds (only once every {{cooldown}} seconds).
item.omnicells.revenant.name: Spectre
item.omnicells.revenant.active: Drain up to {{healthDrain}} health to enter Revenant state and spawn a Void Orb. For every {{drainedHealth}} health drained, summon an Umbral Tendril that deals {{umbralDamage}} umbral damage. If an Umbral Tendril hits a target, it spawns an additional Void Orb upon impact. Picking up a Void Orb grants a stack of Void Energy,  which gives +{{percentDamage}}% damage and extends Revenant state by {{revenantDurationExtend}}  second. Revenant state lasts for {{revenantTime}} seconds and prevents all healing.
item.omnicells.revenant.passive: Lifesteal +{{percentLifesteal}}%. When Revenant state ends, each stack of Void Energy grants {{health}} health per second for {{healthTime}} seconds.
item.omnicells.tempest.name: Tempête
item.omnicells.tempest.active: Consume a stack of Velocity to dash ahead and deal {{shockDamage}} shock damage to a nearby target, prioritizing unbroken behemoth parts. For every {{percentMovementIncreaseThreshold}}% increase in movement speed, deal +{{percentDamageToUnbrokenPart}}% damage to unbroken parts. Stacks are refreshed on use. {{cooldown}} second cooldown.
item.omnicells.tempest.passive: Attack speed +{{percentAttackSpeed}}%. Dodging through an attack grants a stack of Velocity. Each stack lasts {{stackTime}} seconds and increases movement speed by {{percentMovespeed}}%
